content: The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion can be found at the Valley of Ecstasy - Longevity Road Shrine in The New West. From the Shrine, head to the right and around to the back corner of the area. Here you can find the body of Captain Void-Illusion, where you can take the Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Void-Illusion.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion can be found at the Valley of Ecstasy - Longevity Road Shrine in The New West. From the Shrine, head to the right and around to the back corner of the area. Here you can find the body of Captain Void-Illusion, where you can take the Spirit.
